resources.string:
Workaround for apps which won't set a number to notification.

Every time a selected app updates a notification, the number will automatically be incremented.

Note:
This is ONLY necessary if an app does not set the notification number itself!
You can still launch the module settings via Xposed Installer.
Creates a test notification with a random number.

Creates a test notification without a number.
 
Note:
Only shows a number overlay if this app is whitelisted above with “Count updates”.

Creates a test notification without a number, but with a summary text containing the number.
 
Note:
Only shows a number overlay if this app is whitelisted above with “Extract number from notification”.

Version %s 

Base module by Benjamin Bukowski,
GitHub user bbukowski. 
Continued abandoned development. 
So, developed by Woalk Software since then,
GitHub user woalk.
